local_intent: Perceive, move to safe pre-contact height, then approach and align to the T-block with 1 cm tolerance and verify position.
assumptions: 0.02 m offset is a safe pre-contact height
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT approach stage: detect block, move above, robustly approach/align (with retries), then verify pose before subsequent yaw setting and push.
